verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary. Pure and holy, tried and true. With thanksgiving, I’ll be a living Sanctuary for You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, please change me to be more like Thee Filled with mercy, love and grace. And let humility bring sensitivity, As others look at me they’ll see Your face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In all your weakness, See His completeness. He is able to see you through. In trials and testings, He proves His sufficiency To make His likeness shine through you.{/lang-eng}
